official_title: Early Telehealth Visits for Discussion of Advanced Directives for Patients Newly Diagnosed with High Grade Glioma: Impact on Patient Care and Satisfaction
inclusion_criteria:
* New pathologic diagnosis of WHO grade III or IV glioma within four months of consent
* English speaking
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Severe cognitive dysfunction or aphasia precluding discussion of advanced care planning issues
